item.title: About
item.description: A site for trivia statistics! The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Notes and Ideas
item.description: Ideas Plot all mean scores (as line plots) on same plot - hover to highlight a single plot (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/52532428/highlight-all-values-from-a-group-on-hover) we might not be able to do this with a static site, look into it Get round labeled and do stuff (bias table/plot for round types maybe) do score prediction based on difficulty, player average, and round label/maybe biases To Do Finish player plots Format output so we don’t have to scroll through dozens of charts to find the right one

item.title: Viewing Creator Plots
item.description: Plotting the Scores on a Creator’s Round First, load the trivia_stats.R source file, which contains all functions for generating statistics: source("trivia_stats.R") Then run generate_creator_plot(CREATOR_NAME): generate_creator_plot("Alex") generate_creator_plot("Chris") generate_creator_plot("Dad") generate_creator_plot("Drew") generate_creator_plot("Ichigo") generate_creator_plot("Jeff") generate_creator_plot("Jenny") generate_creator_plot("Megan") generate_creator_plot("Mom") generate_creator_plot("Zach")
